mapper.insert: insert into member(memberId, memberPwd, memberName, memberNickname, memberPhoto, memberBirth,memberGender, memberPhone) values(#{memberId},#{memberPwd},#{memberName},#{memberNickname},#{memberPhoto},#{memberBirth},#{memberGender},#{memberPhone})
mapper.select: select memberId, memberPwd, memberName, memberNickname, memberPhoto, memberBirth,memberGender, memberPhone from member where memberId = #{id}
